flawed_nl_solution:
If Alice has 60 pens, Clara 2/5*60=<<300/2=300/2>>300/2 pens.
The number of pens that Alice has more than Clara is 60-300/2=<<60-300/2=-90>>-90
Since Alice is 20, and the number of pens that Alice has more than Clara is their age difference, Clara is 20+-90=<<20+-90=-70>>-70 years old.
In five years, Clara's age will be -70+5=<<-70+5=-65>>-65 years.
#### -65

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 300/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
